Every time you leave your desk, the battery clock starts ticking. Which of your Apple devices will need to recharge first? Luckily, you can recharge three at once with this 3-in-1 Magnetic Wireless Charging Pad.

It looks a lot like Apple’s MagSafe Duo, but it can handle three devices, not just two, which makes it an even more convenient travel charger. Plus, it costs a fraction of what Apple’s charger does. And now it’s even cheaper, thanks to a limited-time deal that drops the price to just $26.97 (regularly $69.99).

This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items.

A foldable charging station for your Apple gear

The design makes all the difference with this unique charging 3-in-1 charger. When folded up, it measures just over 3 square inches. So it’s small enough to stow in your pants pocket, backpack or purse. Fold out the three connected tiles, and you have a versatile power solution that can be laid out flat or configured to meet your needs.

Turn it into a triangle, and you’ve got a phone stand that lets you watch movies, play games or make video calls, juicing up your battery all the while.

Better yet, you can charge up to three devices at the same time, as long as you connect it to a powerful enough wall charger. (Ugreen makes an affordable one for international travel, and Anker makes a wide range of excellent USB-C chargers.)

This folding 3-in-1 charger can accommodate iPhones and wireless-charging AirPods cases. Plus, one tile comes with a flip-up bit that makes it the perfect spot for your Apple Watch. Smartphones can charge at an impressive 15W, while a smart chip guards against overheating.

Meanwhile, the MagSafe-like magnetic pad ensures your iPhone stays put no matter what configuration your charger is in. The silicone material is soft and easy on your gear, but durable enough to withstand the rigors of travel and other movement.

A great 3-in-1 travel charger makes packing and productivity easier

Forgetful packers may benefit from the all-in-one nature of this wireless charging pad, as they won’t need to remember all the cords and wall adapters for their Apple devices. Plus, this streamlined 3-in-1 charger reduces cable clutter. And it comes in two colors: white and black.

Get the 3-in-1 Magnetic Wireless Charging Pad for just $26.97 for a limited time.
